name: bps-pringsewu-backend
description: Sistem Penilaian Kinerja Pegawai BPS Kabupaten Pringsewu

scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate:undo:all && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:fresh: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.test:health: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:5000/api/health', res => {let data=''; res.on('data', chunk => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => console.log(JSON.parse(data)));}).on('error', err => console.error('Health check failed:', err.message));"
scripts.test:health:prod: node -e "require('https').get('https://siapik1810.web.bps.go.id/api/health', res => {let data=''; res.on('data', chunk => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => console.log(JSON.parse(data)));}).on('error', err => console.error('Production health check failed:', err.message));"
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:fresh: npm run db:reset && npm run db:seed
scripts.fix:attendance: npm run db:migrate -- --name add_jumlah_attendance_fields && npm run db:seed
scripts.debug:env: node -e "console.log('NODE_ENV:', process.env.NODE_ENV); console.log('PORT:', process.env.PORT); console.log('DATABASE_URL exists:', !!process.env.DATABASE_URL);"
scripts.debug:prod: NODE_ENV=production node -e "require('dotenv').config({path: '.env.production'}); console.log('Production ENV loaded:', {NODE_ENV: process.env.NODE_ENV, PORT: process.env.PORT, FRONTEND_URL: process.env.FRONTEND_URL});"
